title: Sophisticated Haven In A Premium Lifestyle Enclave - 430 Erlin Drive
posting_body: Capture The Charm, Love The Space, Live The Location
This beautifully located home provides convenient access to Highways 101 & 82, and The San Carlos Airport.
Inside the home enjoy high ceilings, an open concept modern kitchen, a large master bedroom with double vanity, and a breathtaking outdoor view of the South Bay Area!
Other amenities include a central heating, access to community pool, and in-unit laundry.

Enjoy living in the heart of South San Mateo, offering close proximity to Notre Dame de Namur University, Twin Pines Park, Arguello Park, Belmont/San Carlos Train Stations, and More  A rare opportunity.
** Tenant pays for electricity, water, gas, garbage, and cable/internet.
** Security Deposit is equal to 1x the monthly rent based upon approved credit.
(NOTE: In CA, can increase security deposits to 2x rent.
